name: Physician Brief Notification - Assumed Knowledge
description: Terse email from busy physician assuming reader knows device and context. Medium difficulty extraction.

raw_input.body:
Hi,

The portable echo in our cath lab (the EchoView 3000, S/N EV3K-2022-45678) is showing intermittent signal dropout during Doppler assessment. Started about 2 weeks ago. Getting worse. Already changed cables and cleaned transducer - no improvement.

Missed some critical flow measurements yesterday during a valve case. Luckily we had backup but this needs to be addressed ASAP.

Is this a known issue? Can someone call me tomorrow AM?

-J Miller MD

ground_truth.coding_rationale: A0201 (Device Displays Inaccurate Data) or A1403 (No Output) for signal dropout. This is a malfunction but no patient harm occurred (backup was available). No MDR required as no harm resulted.

extraction_challenges: Device info embedded in narrative rather than structured
Must infer manufacturer from email recipient domain
notes: Common pattern from busy physicians - assumes familiarity with device. Need to extract device info from casual mention.
